title: p-planned-service
description: This schema reflects the data specification for bulk Planned Service Challenges (P) within the TNECD Challenge process.

challenge_type.description: Enter the type of challenge being submitted.

provider_name.description: Enter the name of the provider you are challenging.

provider_id.description: This is a 6-digit code generated by the FCC that identifies each service provider. This column will be populated automatically once the provider name has been selected.

technology_code.description: Enter the technology code of the service being challenged.

location_type.description: Enter if the location is a business, Community Anchor Institution (CAI), or residential (including multiple dwelling units).
